channel.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
channel.description: So, everytime I try to run a script let's say auto wcer it doesn't do anything. I put the color in RS to VBright and put the chat things in the RS window to off, but it doesn't do anything. My mouse won't even move. How can I use the auto wcers if my mouse won't move?

item.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Maybe the script is outdated? Something could have happened to make Solemn’s miner no longer work… Try a different script.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:6, topic:69577”]Run this in SCAR:

program New; begin MoveMouseSmoothEx(1, 1, 5, 5, 5, 5, 5); if LowerCase(ReadLn('Did it move?')) = 'yes' then Writeln('It was probably the script') else Writeln('Are you using Windows?'); end.

Best way I can see if you have a probem.[/quote]
It worked, it moved my mouse.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

program New; var x, y, a, b: Integer; begin GetMousePos(x, y); MoveMouse(x + 40, y + 40); GetMousePos(a, b); if ((a - 30) >= x) and ((b - 30) >= y) then WriteLn('MoveMouse works fine..') else begin WriteLn(IntToStr(x) + ', ' + IntToStr(y) + Chr(13) + IntToStr(a) + ', ' + IntToStr(b)); end;
Hehe, sorry. I had to make one.
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Don’t think so, I used solemn wishes essence miner.

Run this in SCAR:

program New; begin MoveMouseSmoothEx(1, 1, 5, 5, 5, 5, 5); if LowerCase(ReadLn('Did it move?')) = 'yes' then Writeln('It was probably the script') else Writeln('Are you using Windows?'); end.

Best way I can see if you have a probem.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Don’t think so, I used solemn wishes essence miner.

Theres something wrong with the script then.

item.title: Help, I'm new with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Yeah, I did that and then I click Run Script then the mouse starts clicking on the Runescape screen and it doesn’t ´move, it just click on the inventory. I have set the correct colors etc.

Read full topic

Did you drag the crosshair to the runescape window?
